text: Glycaemic control <12mmol/L Avoid pre-emptive use of NGT. Associated with increased risk of reflux causing: -Fever -Atelectasis -Pneumonia Fluids -TOE volume status assessment -Balanced crystalloids - Aim: zero fluid balance Thromboprophylaxis -Epidurals inserted/removed >12 post LMWH prophylaxis dose Antibiotic prophylaxis -Repeat dose as necessary Gut motility -Oral laxative post operatively - Chewing gum
